name: 余琬琴
objective:
本課程乃針對高分子加工過程中，所遇到有關流力之問題，做一綜合性之概述。其主要內容包括：
(1)流體的分類 (2) 伯努力方程式 (3) 管流 (4) Navier-Stokes 方程式。
schedule:
1. Introduction and basic concepts
2. Properties of fluids
3. Pressure and fluid statics
4. Mass, Bernoulli, and energy equations
5. Flow in pipes
6. Differential analysis of fluid flow
materials: Essentials of Fluid Mechanics by Cimbala and Cengel, McGraw Hill (滄海)
